Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1 NORTH FIELD COURT, LAKE FOREST, Illinois, 60045, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Packaging Corp of America is the fourth- largest containerboard and corrugated packaging manufacturer in the United States. It produces roughly 4 million tons of containerboard annually. The company's share of the domestic containerboard market is about 10%. It differentiates itself from larger competitors by focusing on smaller customers and operating with a high degree of flexibility. Its three reportable segments: Packaging, Paper and Corporate and Other.

value.name: Robert A. Schneider
value.title: Chief Information Officer & Senior Vice President
